label: uncl8053
comment: Code qualifying a type of equipment.

values.label: Ground equipment
values.comment: Ground equipment being fuelled or serviced.

values.label: Chain
values.comment: Chain used in the securing of cargo.

values.label: Temperature recorder
values.comment: Temperature recorder to provide a record of the actual temperature.

values.label: Body trailer
values.comment: The part of the vehicle where the cargo is loaded.

values.label: Slipsheet
values.comment: A cardboard platform used for holding product for storage or transportation.

values.label: No special equipment needed
values.comment: A code to indicate that there is no special equipment needed.

values.label: Vessel hold
values.comment: A compartment forming part of a transport vessel.

values.label: Flat rack
values.comment: Type of open container used for carrying objects.

values.label: Aircraft
values.comment: To indicate that the equipment is an aircraft.

values.label: Medical device
values.comment: A device used for medical purposes.

values.label: Refrigerated container
values.comment: A refrigerated (reefer) container that is actively cooling the product.

values.label: Synthetic pallet 80*120cm
values.comment: A pallet with standard dimensions 80*120 centimetres made of synthetic material.

values.label: Synthetic pallet 100*120cm
values.comment: A standard pallet with standard dimensions 100*120 centimetres made of synthetic material.

values.label: Clothing hanger rack
values.comment: Equipment used to store and transport clothing in a hanging position.

values.label: Road/rail trailer
values.comment: Trailer designated for combined road/rail use.

values.label: Overhang wagon
values.comment: Empty rail wagon added to the loaded wagons, when goods are longer than the loaded wagon.

values.label: Un-containerized cargo (breakbulk)
values.comment: Cargoes in bulk not stuffed in equipment.

values.label: Blocks
values.comment: A piece of equipment that is normally a piece of wood to fix cargo (e.g. coils) during transport.

values.label: Box pallet non-exchangeable
values.comment: A box pallet which cannot be exchanged.

values.label: Truck being transported
values.comment: A road vehicle capable of carrying goods which is being carried on another means of transport.

values.label: Truck and trailer combination being transported
values.comment: A road vehicle capable of carrying goods with an attached trailer which is being carried on another means of transport.

values.label: Tractor and trailer being transported
values.comment: A trailer accompanied by a self-propelling tractor unit which is being carried on another means of transport.

values.label: Postal bag
values.comment: Bag intended primarily for the conveyance of postal items.

values.label: Letter Tray
values.comment: Tray intended primarily for the conveyance of letter mail items of size slightly exceeding C5, in which the items are stood on their long edge.

values.label: Roller Cage
values.comment: Wheeled wire cage.

values.label: Flats Tray
values.comment: Tray intended primarily for the conveyance of letter mail items of from C5 up to in excess of C4, in which the items are stacked one on top of another. May also be used for letter mail smaller items stood on their long edge.

values.label: Out of bag parcel
values.comment: Postal item which is conveyed individually, with only the wrapping provided by the mailer for protection.

values.label: Wheeled Platform
values.comment: Device, consisting of a flat surface mounted on a wheels, which is designed for the conveyance of items which may safely be stacked. Normally also equipped with a handle to allow the device to be easily manoeuvred.

values.label: Container non-compliant with the Customs Convention on Containers
values.comment: The container is not compliant with the Customs Convention on Containers.

values.label: Box pallet EUR Y non exchangeable
values.comment: A euro-pallet of type Y that may not be exchanged.

values.label: Roll Pallet 1
values.comment: 80 X 60 cm pallet on casters.

values.label: Barge
values.comment: Flat bottomed inland cargo vessel for canals and rivers with or without own propulsion for the purpose of transported goods. (Synonym: Lighter).

values.label: Boxcar
values.comment: An enclosed railway goods wagon.

values.label: Chassis
values.comment: A wheeled carriage onto which an ocean container is mounted for inland conveyance.

values.label: Container
values.comment: Equipment item as defined by ISO for transport. It must be of: A) permanent character, strong enough for repeated use; B) designed to facilitate the carriage of goods, by one or more modes of transport, without intermediate reloading; C) fitted with devices for its ready handling, particularly.

values.label: Deadlight (panel)
values.comment: A set of panels fixed inside a porthole.

values.label: Roll Pallet 2
values.comment: 120 X 60 cm pallet on casters.

values.label: Container gantry crane
values.comment: A fixed gantry crane ashore for container handling operations.

values.label: Mobile crane
values.comment: A mobile crane for handling operations.

values.label: Floating crane
values.comment: A crane mounted on a dedicated vessel.

values.label: Ship's equipment crane
values.comment: A crane mounted on a ship for handling operations.

values.label: Conveyor belt
values.comment: Rolling carpet belt.

values.label: Forklift
values.comment: Equipment device for handling and moving goods.

values.label: Stacking equipment
values.comment: Equipment device for stacking goods.

values.label: Taillift
values.comment: Equipment device at the rear of a truck for loading and unloading cargo.

values.label: Pallet ISO 0 - 1/2 EURO Pallet
values.comment: Standard pallet with dimensions 80 X 60 cm.

values.label: On-board equipment
values.comment: Equipment permanently on board a means of transport.

values.label: Pallet ISO 1 - 1/1 EURO Pallet (GS1 Temporary Code)
values.comment: Standard pallet with dimensions 80 X 120 cm.

values.label: Pallet ISO 2
values.comment: Standard pallet with dimensions 100 X 120 cm.

values.label: 1/4 EURO Pallet
values.comment: Standard pallet with dimensions 60 X 40 cm.

values.label: Exchangeable EUR flat pallet
values.comment: A flat euro-pallet that may be exchanged.

values.label: 1/8 EURO Pallet
values.comment: Standard pallet with dimensions 40 X 30 cm.

values.label: Wholesaler pallet
values.comment: Pallet provided by the wholesaler.

values.label: Pallet 80 X 100 cm
values.comment: Pallet with dimensions 80 X 100 cm.

values.label: Pallet 60 X 100 cm
values.comment: Pallet with dimensions 60 X 100 cm.

values.label: Oneway pallet
values.comment: Pallet need not be returned to the point of expedition.

values.label: Returnable pallet
values.comment: Pallet must be returned to the point of expedition.

values.label: Bottlecrate
values.comment: A container for the storage or movement of bottles, a.k.a. bottlerack.

values.label: Bottle, non-protected, cylindrical
values.comment: A non-protected cylindrical container with a narrow neck made usually of glass or plastic which is especially used for liquids.

values.label: Box
values.comment: A lidded package which can be made of cardboard, wood, plastic,tin,etc.

values.label: CHEP Eurobox
values.comment: A box mounted on a pallet base under the control of CHEP.

values.label: Case
values.comment: A package such as a box.

values.label: Display package
values.comment: A package used for the dispaly of goods, usually during a promotion.

values.label: Isothermic case
values.comment: A case used for products which require constant temperature control.

values.label: Pallet modular collars 80*100
values.comment: Collars, with the dimensions 80cms * 100cms, which when fitted onto a pallet enable the pallet to be transformed into a box pallet with, if necessary, a lid.

values.label: Pallet modular collars 80*120
values.comment: Collars, with the dimensions 80cms * 120cms, which when fitted onto a pallet enable the pallet to be transformed into a box pallet with, if necessary, a lid.

values.label: Tray
values.comment: A flat receptacle with low sides for carrying or holding articles.

values.label: Roll cage
values.comment: A three sided cage mounted on wheels.

values.label: Trolley
values.comment: A low cart for the transportation and storage of groceries, milk, etc.

values.label: Landside power generator
values.comment: A generator located landside at a terminal, used to provide electric power to a vessel or other means of transport.

values.label: Exchangeable EUR Y box pallet
values.comment: A euro-pallet of type Y that may be exchanged.

values.label: Flat pallet EUR non exchangeable
values.comment: A flat euro-pallet that may not be exchanged.

values.label: Flat pallet (railway property) non-exchangeable
values.comment: A non-exchangeable flat pallet owned by a railroad.

values.label: Lidded stackable rigid tray (CEN TS 14482:2002)
values.comment: Lidded stackable rigid tray compliant with CEN TS 14482:2002.

values.label: Lashing rope
values.comment: A rope for lashing cargo.

values.label: Load/unload device on equipment
values.comment: A mechanical device used in the loading and/or unloading of cargo into and from transport equipment.

values.label: Movable panel
values.comment: A panel which can be moved.

values.label: Pallet
values.comment: A platform on which goods can be stacked in order to facilitate the movement by a forklift or sling.

values.label: Identified private box pallet
values.comment: A box pallet identified as being privately owned.

values.label: Identified private flat pallet
values.comment: A flat pallet identified as being privately owned.

values.label: Platform
values.comment: A piece of equipment normally having a flat surface, or prepared for carrying cargo with a specific shape.

values.label: Protecting panel
values.comment: A panel used for protection.

values.label: Portable stove
values.comment: A portable heating unit.

values.label: Flat car
values.comment: A railway wagon without raised sides or ends.

values.label: Reefer generator
values.comment: A generator used to control the temperature in temperature-controlled transport equipment.

values.label: Ground facility
values.comment: Storage tank or facility capable of receiving shipment of goods or commodity.

values.label: Rope
values.comment: Rope used in the securing of cargo.

values.label: Rail car
values.comment: To identify that the equipment is a rail car.

values.label: Identified special pallet
values.comment: A pallet identified as special.

values.label: Strap
values.comment: A narrow strip of flexible material.

values.label: Swap body
values.comment: Rectangular equipment unit without wheels, which can be mounted on a chassis or positioned on legs.

values.label: Trailer
values.comment: A vehicle without motive power, designed for the carriage of cargo and to be towed by a motor vehicle.

values.label: Tarpaulin
values.comment: Waterproof material, e.g. canvas, to spread over cargo to protect it from getting wet.

values.label: Tackles
values.comment: Identification of loading tackle used (sheets, ropes, chains, etc.), as specified in DCU 9 to CIM Article 13; and of containers, as specified in Articles 5 and 10 of Annex III to CIM (CIM 17).

values.label: Tarpaulin support
values.comment: A device to support a tarpaulin.

values.label: ULD (Unit load device)
values.comment: An aircraft container or pallet.
